clues.text: (Jimmy of the Clue Crew shows a map on the monitor.)  The Great Loop, the circumnavigation of eastern North America via lakes, rivers & intracoastal waterways, was popularized by a couple who made the trip after departing from this Florida spring break Mecca in a 40-foot trawler in 1994
In 2010,shebecame the youngest recipient of the Mark Twain prize for humor
